title: The Unknown Adventures of Ling Morgan
summary: Ling Morgan, a 51-year-old tutor, discovers her ability to influence thoughts which she uses to guide her community towards positive changes over the span of a week.
summaryGerman: Ling Morgan, eine 51-jährige Tutorin, entdeckt ihre Fähigkeit, Gedanken zu beeinflussen, die sie nutzt, um ihre Gemeinschaft innerhalb einer Woche zu positiven Veränderungen zu führen.
summaryDutch: Ling Morgan, een 51-jarige tutor, ontdekt haar vermogen om gedachten te beïnvloeden, die ze gebruikt om haar gemeenschap binnen een week naar positieve veranderingen te leiden.
summaryFrench: Ling Morgan, une tutrice de 51 ans, découvre sa capacité à influencer les pensées qu'elle utilise pour guider sa communauté vers des changements positifs sur l'étendue d'une semaine.

story.text: Ling Morgan woke up to her usual routine, unaware that today would be different. As she tutored her students, she realized her advice was unusually insightful, deeply influencing their decisions.
Curious about her newfound influence, Ling spent the day experimenting subtly with her abilities during her advising sessions. She helped resolve long-standing conflicts among her peers.
With confidence growing, Ling used her powers more openly, guiding her community towards improvements and healing frayed relations at the local community center.

Despite her successes, Ling felt a pang of doubt about the ethics of her abilities. She spent a quiet day reflecting on her actions and their implications, seeking guidance from her late mentor's writings.
After much thought, Ling decided to set strict moral guidelines for using her powers. She felt energized and ready to make a responsible impact.
Ling organized a community gathering to openly share her experiences and set an example of transparency and ethical use of her powers. The community offered their support and admiration.
Feeling at peace, Ling spent her day preparing new material for her tutoring sessions, integrating lessons about ethical decision-making and personal growth.

ending: And so, Ling Morgan became not only a tutor but a wise guardian of her community, wielding her powers with responsibility and grace.
moral: With great power comes great responsibility.
